lead_paragraph: BP's sell-off has reportedly come to Europe, with Wirtschafts Woche, a German business weekly, citing unidentified investment bankers as saying that the oil company is seeking to sell its Aral chain of gas stations, whose value is estimated at 2 billion euros.

headline.main: BP Said to Seek Buyers for German Gas Stations

abstract: BP's sell-off has reportedly come to Europe, with Wirtschafts Woche, a German business weekly, citing unidentified investment bankers as saying that the oil company is seeking to sell its Aral chain of gas stations, whose value is estimated at 2 billion euros.
